thread.section_title: Greenvelope.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Greenvelope.com | greenvelope.com | 2 of 85
thread.title: Alex

author: Alex
title: Alex
text:
It's very helpul to send invitatiins to people who live in different cities and you can't meet personally to hand an official invitation. The map is also aweaome to have for those who don't know where the venue is. Not to mention how great it is to be able to keep track of who's coming and who's not (if they rsvp- my list of people didn't although they tols me they are) - i'm thinking maybe there's another way to highlight the rsvp part.
Can't say I loved the designs, some of them seemed unfitting for a wedding invitation, but there are a few that will do the trick.
